name: Romane et Julien
description:
A Game released for the ETPA Game Jam the 14th-15th May 2022

The first idea was to release a two-spit-screen game where you bring chaos in the house of your opponent and have to destroy more things than your adversary before time's up.

So this release is a single player version of the game. You embody one of the ex lover and try to destroy the more you can in a time limit. For that, you can find and craft weapons to massively destroy your opponent's house !

Use ZQSD to move, SPACE to jump and Mouse to move camera and destroy things (Right click to Melee and Left to Shoot) . To craft things, press R.

Joysticks to move, A to Jump, B to release, X to hit melee and Triggers to shoot. Y to craft.
